additions.advancements.witherstormmod.main.nearly_: Almost kill the Wither Storm during it's hunchback phases using melee/projectile weapons
additions.advancements.witherstormmod.main.overly_: Craft a Wooden Command Block hoe, you are a strange one, but I respect it
additions.commands.witherstormmod.conversion.block: Area is too large; max allowed: %s
additions.description.withered_phlegm.use:
A sticky block regurgitated by the Wither Storm containing some items it thought unsavory...
Stores players items when they get chomped by the Wither Storm
Acts as a vacuum hopper. Power with a lever to disable
Specifies the amount of time (in minutes) required for the Wither Storm to automatically spawn, if enabled.
Range: 0 ~ 120
additions.gui.witherstormmod.config.autoSpawnWithe: Specifies if the Wither Storm should automatically be spawned upon world creation.
additions.gui.witherstormmod.config.blockClusterPu:
Modifies the Wither Storm's block cluster pull speed by multiplying the default speed with this value.
Range: 0.1 ~ 10.0
additions.gui.witherstormmod.config.canClustersSpi: Specifies if block clusters can have a chance to spiral counter clockwise when being consumed by the Wither Storm.
additions.gui.witherstormmod.config.caveRumbleInte:
Higher values makes cave rumbles more 'intense,' and makes more dripstone and glowberries fall.
Range: 0.0 ~ 1.0

Specifies the maximum interval possible (in seconds) between cave rumbles.
Range: 5 ~ 1800

Specifies the minimum interval possible (in seconds) between cave rumbles.
Range: 5 ~ 1800
additions.gui.witherstormmod.config.caveRumblesMes: Specifies if cave rumbles should mess with redstone type blocks.
additions.gui.witherstormmod.config.chanceForExten: Specifies if a random chance for extended cave rumbles to occur should be possible.
additions.gui.witherstormmod.config.constantBlackh: CAUTION THIS WILL BE EXTREMELY LAGGY, THIS SETS THE WITHER STORM TO HAVE NO SMALL CLUSTER COOLDOWN.
additions.gui.witherstormmod.config.dynamicFlyingH: Makes the Wither Storm randomly adjust it's flying height itself between 40 and 80.

The time (in seconds) that the Wither Storm should take before adjusting it's dynamic flying height.
Range: 15 ~ 1200
additions.gui.witherstormmod.config.endOfPhaseFive: Specifies if only the end of phase five can be formidibombed, instead of all of phase 5.
End Of Phase Five Formidibombable Exclusively
additions.gui.witherstormmod.config.farthestTarget:
Makes the Wither Storm target the player that was farthest from it while using FARTHEST targeting for the configured amount of time (in minutes).
Range: 1 ~ 60
additions.gui.witherstormmod.config.flyingEnabledW: Specifies if a warning should be printed out to server operators if flying is disabled.
additions.gui.witherstormmod.config.formidibombFus: Specifies if a formidibomb's auto detonation fuse should be enabled.
additions.gui.witherstormmod.config.hideDebrisRing: Hides the debris rings until the Wither Storm has split (phase 6).
additions.gui.witherstormmod.config.injectAiMobBla: A list of mobs that should not have custom AI injected into them
additions.gui.witherstormmod.config.instantChomp.d: Specifies if a Wither Storm head should immediately kill the player upon biting them. Does not apply to heads inside the bowels.
additions.gui.witherstormmod.config.itemPreservati: When a player dies, a block cluster containing their items will be created into the world based on the condition defined by this value. Acts as a gravestone.
additions.gui.witherstormmod.config.onlyTryPicking: Makes the Wither Storm attempt to only grab blocks that were tagged in the Tractor Distractions json.
Only Try Picking Up Tractor Tagged
additions.gui.witherstormmod.config.playMinecraftM: Specifies if Minecraft music should play at all. Used for if you want the boss music to play but not the Minecraft music.
additions.gui.witherstormmod.config.preserveDropsF: Specifies if drops should be preserved using block clusters (gravestones) for all mobs, not just players.
additions.gui.witherstormmod.config.randomlySpeedU: When set to true the Wither Storm will have a 10% chance to speedup when it changes it's targeting type while using RANDOMIZED targeting.
Randomly Speed Up With Target Change
additions.gui.witherstormmod.config.removeNearbyJu: Specifies if junk items near the Wither Storm should be immediately destroyed. NOTE: Disabling will cause massive server side and potential FPS lag!.
additions.gui.witherstormmod.config.renderEmissive: Specifies if the emissive decal (eyes and teeth) for the Wither Storm heads should be rendered.
additions.gui.witherstormmod.config.shouldChunkLoa: Should Chunk Load When No Players
additions.gui.witherstormmod.config.shouldPlayGlob: Specifies if global sounds made by the Wither Storm (e.x. evolve sound) should play cross dimensionally.
additions.gui.witherstormmod.config.shouldSymbiont: Specifies if the Withered Symbiont is hostile towards other mobs (This is only applied to Symbionts spawned after this change is applied).
additions.gui.witherstormmod.config.specialTargeti: Specifies if certain mobs (by default, players) should be targeted over others.

The percent chance certain mobs (by default, players) should be picked up over others.
Range: 0 ~ 100
additions.gui.witherstormmod.config.tractorBeamBlo:
How far the tractor beams should search for distraction blocks, NOTE: High values may cause lag.
Range: 4 ~ 256
additions.gui.witherstormmod.config.tractorBeamClu: Specifies if the Wither Storm should be able to pick up block clusters with its tractor beams.

Multiplies the speed of block clusters being pulled in by a Wither Storm's tractor beam by this value.
Range: 0.1 ~ 10.0
additions.gui.witherstormmod.config.witherStormsFo: Specifies if smaller Wither Storms should follow one with more consumed entities.
additions.item.witherstormmod.formidi_blade.author: By: MegaMathew200
additions.item.witherstormmod.formidi_blade.use: Right-click to charge. Attack to create an explosion.

gui.witherstormmod.config.amuletOverride.new: Specifies if the amulet should override the Wither Storm's targeting.
gui.witherstormmod.config.amuletOverride.old: Specifies if the amulet should override the Wither Storm's targeting

gui.witherstormmod.config.applicationDel.new:
High immunity mobs (players) will be assigned a random application delay modifier that will change the application delay. This value will set the maximum potential limit for that modifier, in seconds.
Range: 12 ~ 1200
gui.witherstormmod.config.applicationDel.old:
High immunity mobs (players) will be assigned a random application delay modifier that will change the application delay. This value will set the maximum potential limit for that modifier, in seconds
Range: 12 ~ 1200

gui.witherstormmod.config.asyncBufferBui.new: Builds instanced vertex buffers off thread to help reduce stuttering. It is only recommended to disable this if facing compatibility issues.
gui.witherstormmod.config.asyncBufferBui.old: Builds instanced vertex buffers off thread to help reduce stuttering. It is only recommended to disable this if facing compatibility issues

gui.witherstormmod.config.attackableWhen.new: Specifies if the Withered Symbiont can be attacked from behind if it's not vulnerable.
gui.witherstormmod.config.attackableWhen.old: Specifies if the symbiont can be attacked from behind if it's not vulnerable

gui.witherstormmod.config.blindingEffect.new: Specifies whether or not a white overlay should cover the screen during certain events.
gui.witherstormmod.config.blindingEffect.old: Specifies whether or not a white overlay should cover the screen during certain events

gui.witherstormmod.config.blockClusterRe.new: Toggles the rendering of Block Clusters.
gui.witherstormmod.config.blockClusterRe.old: Toggles the rendering of Block Clusters

gui.witherstormmod.config.boatingForTooL.new: Specifies if the Wither Storm should get distracted when a player boats across water for too long. Used to prevent specific scenarios where the Wither Storm is chasing players but it can't quite keep up.
gui.witherstormmod.config.boatingForTooL.old: Specifies if the Wither Storm should get distracted when a player boats across water for too long. Used to prevent specific scenarios where the Wither Storm is chasing players but it can't quite keep up

gui.witherstormmod.config.boatingForTooL.new:
The amount of time a player needs to be boating until the Wither Storm will become distracted.
Range: 30 ~ 300
gui.witherstormmod.config.boatingForTooL.old:
The amount of time a player needs to be boating until the Wither Storm will become distracted
Range: 30 ~ 300

gui.witherstormmod.config.bookDropsInInv.new: If multiple players are near the Withered Symbiont, the command block book will automatically drop into the inventory of the player the Symbiont was spawned for, if they are nearby and have inventory space.
gui.witherstormmod.config.bookDropsInInv.old: If multiple players are near the Withered Symbiont, the command block book will automatically drop into the inventory of the player the Symbiont was spawned for, if they are nearby and have inventory space

gui.witherstormmod.config.bowelsFallResi.new: Specifies if max strength damange resistance should be given to the player when falling out of the bowels, to mitigate fall damage.
gui.witherstormmod.config.bowelsFallResi.old: Specifies if max strength damange resistance should be given to the player when falling out of the bowels, to mitigate fall damage

gui.witherstormmod.config.cameraShakeEff.new: Specifies whether or not camera shake effects should be used.
gui.witherstormmod.config.cameraShakeEff.old: Specifies whether or not camera shake effects should be used

gui.witherstormmod.config.canAttackHeads.new: Specifies if the Wither Storm's heads can be attacked.
gui.witherstormmod.config.canAttackHeads.old: Specifies if the Wither Storm's heads can be attacked

gui.witherstormmod.config.canPickupMobCl.new: Specifies if the Wither Storm's tractor beams can pull in multiple mobs at once that interesect the beam.
gui.witherstormmod.config.canPickupMobCl.old: Specifies if the Wither Storm's tractor beams can pull in multiple mobs at once that interesect the beam

gui.witherstormmod.config.canSummonSymbi.new: Specifies if the Wither Storm can summon the Withered Symbiont.
gui.witherstormmod.config.canSummonSymbi.old: Specifies if the Wither Storm can summon the Withered Symbiont

gui.witherstormmod.config.catchFireFuseT.new:
If the formidibomb is manually set on fire the fuse tick count will be set to this value, if the original fuse is greater than this value.
Range: 1 ~ 12000
gui.witherstormmod.config.catchFireFuseT.old:
If the formidibomb is manually set on fire the fuse tick count will be set to this value, if the original fuse is greater than this value
Range: 1 ~ 12000

gui.witherstormmod.config.caveRumbles.de.new: Specifies if the screen should shake and other various cave rumble effects should occur when underground and near the Storm.
gui.witherstormmod.config.caveRumbles.de.old: Specifies if the screen should shake and other various cave rumble effects should occur when underground and near the Storm

gui.witherstormmod.config.chaseOnPhaseCh.new: Specifies if the Wither Storm should accelerate when it evolves into the next phase..
gui.witherstormmod.config.chaseOnPhaseCh.old: Specifies if the Wither Storm should accelerate when it evolves into the next phase.

gui.witherstormmod.config.chromaticAberr.new: Toggle to enable/disable the chromatic aberration effect.
gui.witherstormmod.config.chromaticAberr.old: Toggle to enable/disable the chromatic aberration effect

gui.witherstormmod.config.chunksToLoad.d.new:
Specifies the maximum amount of chunks the Wither Storm should load around itself.
Range: 9 ~ 576
gui.witherstormmod.config.chunksToLoad.d.old:
Specifies the maximum amount of chunks the Wither Storm should load around itself
Range: 9 ~ 576

gui.witherstormmod.config.clusterPickupI.new:
Alters the interval (in ticks) of picking up block clusters for the destroyer phases (phase 4 - 5). NOTE: This value changes the evolution speed of the Wither Storm significantly.
Range: 10 ~ 80
gui.witherstormmod.config.clusterPickupI.old:
Alters the interval (in ticks) of picking up block clusters for the destroyer phases (phase 4 - 5). NOTE: This value changes the evolution speed of the Wither Storm significantly
Range: 10 ~ 80

gui.witherstormmod.config.clusterSizeMod.new:
Increases the radius of block clusters linearly by this amount. NOTE: Greatly impacts the Wither Storm's evolution rate. Greater values also lead to worse performance!.
Range: 0 ~ 16
gui.witherstormmod.config.clusterSizeMod.old:
Increases the radius of block clusters linearly by this amount. NOTE: Greatly impacts the Wither Storm's evolution rate. Greater values also lead to worse performance!
Range: 0 ~ 16

gui.witherstormmod.config.clustersRemove.new: Specifies if Block Clusters should remove non-important items in its path. NOTE: Disabling can cause major lag.
gui.witherstormmod.config.clustersRemove.old: Specifies if Block Clusters should remove non-important items in its path. NOTE: Disabling can cause major lag

gui.witherstormmod.config.craftFuseTicks.new:
Specifies the fuse in ticks that count down to the formidibomb's explosion. The fuse is set when the block is crafted.
Range: 1 ~ 12000
gui.witherstormmod.config.craftFuseTicks.old:
Specifies the fuse in ticks that count down to the formidibomb's explosion. The fuse is set when the block is crafted
Range: 1 ~ 12000

gui.witherstormmod.config.crossbowsSuppo.new: Specifies if crossbows should be able to also shoot ender pearls. Disable if facing compatibility issues.
gui.witherstormmod.config.crossbowsSuppo.old: Specifies if crossbows should be able to also shoot ender pearls. Disable if facing compatibility issues

gui.witherstormmod.config.cureDelayModif.new:
High immunity mobs (players) will be assigned a random cure delay modifier that will change the cure delay. This value will set the maximum potential limit for that modifier, in seconds.
Range: 12 ~ 1200
gui.witherstormmod.config.cureDelayModif.old:
High immunity mobs (players) will be assigned a random cure delay modifier that will change the cure delay. This value will set the maximum potential limit for that modifier, in seconds
Range: 12 ~ 1200

gui.witherstormmod.config.customPanorama.new: Toggles the custom main menu panorama added by the mod.
gui.witherstormmod.config.customPanorama.old: Toggles the custom main menu panorama added by the mod

gui.witherstormmod.config.devourerCluste.new:
Alters the interval (in ticks) of picking up block clusters for the devourer phases (phase 6+). NOTE: This value changes the evolution speed of the Wither Storm significantly.
Range: 10 ~ 80
gui.witherstormmod.config.devourerCluste.old:
Alters the interval (in ticks) of picking up block clusters for the devourer phases (phase 6+). NOTE: This value changes the evolution speed of the Wither Storm significantly
Range: 10 ~ 80

gui.witherstormmod.config.distanceMultip.new:
Specifies if the Wither Storm should use this value as a multiplier when calculating the time in ticks it takes for it to start accelerating, when its ultimate target is stationary.
Range: 0.1 ~ 24.0
gui.witherstormmod.config.distanceMultip.old:
Specifies if the Wither Storm should use this value as a multiplier when calculating the time in ticks it takes for it to start accelerating, when its ultimate target is stationary
Range: 0.1 ~ 24.0

gui.witherstormmod.config.distantFog.des.new: Specifies if fog should be applied to Wither Storms being rendered from a distance.
gui.witherstormmod.config.distantFog.des.old: Specifies if fog should be applied to Wither Storms being rendered from a distance

gui.witherstormmod.config.distantRendere.new: The distant renderer allows for the Wither Storm to be rendered from much greater distances than what vanilla allows. Disable if you're facing issues with it.
gui.witherstormmod.config.distantRendere.old: The distant renderer allows for the Wither Storm to be rendered from much greater distances than what vanilla allows. Disable if you're facing issues with it

gui.witherstormmod.config.distractionTim.new:
Specifies the time in minutes that the Wither Storm should be distracted for, plus some random modifying and more.
Range: 1 ~ 25
gui.witherstormmod.config.distractionTim.old:
Specifies the time in minutes that the Wither Storm should be distracted for, plus some random modifying and more
Range: 1 ~ 25

gui.witherstormmod.config.distractionWai.new:
For when the Wither Storm needs to wait to become distracted, this value (in minutes) will specifiy the wait time, plus a random modifier.
Range: 1 ~ 20
gui.witherstormmod.config.distractionWai.old:
For when the Wither Storm needs to wait to become distracted, this value (in minutes) will specifiy the wait time, plus a random modifier
Range: 1 ~ 20

gui.witherstormmod.config.dropInterval.d.new:
Specifies the interval for when the formidibomb will drop out of its inventory (if enabled). This value divides the crafted fuse ticks to get the interval (e.x. 12000 / 4 = 3000).
Range: 1 ~ 8
gui.witherstormmod.config.dropInterval.d.old:
Specifies the interval for when the formidibomb will drop out of its inventory (if enabled). This value divides the crafted fuse ticks to get the interval (e.x. 12000 / 4 = 3000)
Range: 1 ~ 8

gui.witherstormmod.config.earRingingEffe.new: Turn off to disable the ear ringing effects used in the mod.
gui.witherstormmod.config.earRingingEffe.old: Turn off to disable the ear ringing effects used in the mod

gui.witherstormmod.config.evolutionAttri.new:
Specifies a modifier value of the evolution rate attribute. The higher the value, the longer it takes for the Wither Storm to make a complete evolution (from phases 0 to 7), and vice versa. Cannot be lower than 0.
Range: 0.01 ~ 32.0
gui.witherstormmod.config.evolutionAttri.old:
Specifies a modifier value of the evolution rate attribute. The higher the value, the longer it takes for the Wither Storm to make a complete evolution (from phases 0 to 7), and vice versa. Cannot be lower than 0
Range: 0.01 ~ 32.0

gui.witherstormmod.config.flamingSkullEx.new:
The flaming skull explosion size when they collide with blocks.
Range: 1.0 ~ 16.0
gui.witherstormmod.config.flamingSkullEx.old:
The flaming skull explosion size when they collide with blocks
Range: 1.0 ~ 16.0

gui.witherstormmod.config.flamingSkullSp.new:
The speed modifier for flaming wither skulls. Higher = faster.
Range: 0.5 ~ 8.0
gui.witherstormmod.config.flamingSkullSp.old:
The speed modifier for flaming wither skulls. Higher = faster
Range: 0.5 ~ 8.0

gui.witherstormmod.config.flyingHeight.d.new:
Specifies the height the Wither Storm will fly at during phase 4 and up.
Range: 10 ~ 150
gui.witherstormmod.config.flyingHeight.d.old:
Specifies the height the Wither Storm will fly at during phase 4 and up
Range: 10 ~ 150

gui.witherstormmod.config.headEscapeTime.new:
The targeting invulnerability time in seconds players who escape from a Wither Storm after injuring a head get.
Range: 0 ~ 60
gui.witherstormmod.config.headEscapeTime.old:
The targeting invulnerability time in seconds players who escape from a Wither Storm after injuring a head get
Range: 0 ~ 60

gui.witherstormmod.config.healthScalePer.new:
Adds this value multiplied by the amount of nearby players to the Symbiont's max health when it is spawned. Set to zero to disable this feature.
Range: 0.0 ~ 100.0
gui.witherstormmod.config.healthScalePer.old:
Adds this value multiplied by the amount of nearby players to the Symbiont's max health when it is spawned. Set to zero to disable this feature
Range: 0.0 ~ 100.0

gui.witherstormmod.config.hunchbackClust.new:
Alters the interval (in ticks) of picking up block clusters for the hunchback phases (phase 0 - 3). NOTE: This value changes the evolution speed of the Wither Storm significantly.
Range: 10 ~ 80
gui.witherstormmod.config.hunchbackClust.old:
Alters the interval (in ticks) of picking up block clusters for the hunchback phases (phase 0 - 3). NOTE: This value changes the evolution speed of the Wither Storm significantly
Range: 10 ~ 80

gui.witherstormmod.config.ignoreUltimate.new: If the Wither Storm's ultimate target is hidden (bossbar is not visible for that target) for an extended period of time, it will ignore that target temporarily and go for a different player. Toggle to disable. NOTE: Only functional on a multiplayer environment.
gui.witherstormmod.config.ignoreUltimate.old: If the Wither Storm's ultimate target is hidden (bossbar is not visible for that target) for an extended period of time, it will ignore that target temporarily and go for a different player. Toggle to disable. NOTE: Only functional on a multiplayer environment

gui.witherstormmod.config.increaseAmplif.new: Specifies if entities who are reinfected over a short period of time should receive wither sickness with a greater strength.
gui.witherstormmod.config.increaseAmplif.old: Specifies if entities who are reinfected over a short period of time should receive wither sickness with a greater strength

gui.witherstormmod.config.invulnerabilit.new:
Specifies the invulnerability time when the Wither Storm has been summoned, in seconds. When invulnerable, the Wither Storm doesn't move and can't be attacked.
Range: 1 ~ 320
gui.witherstormmod.config.invulnerabilit.old:
Specifies the invulnerability time when the Wither Storm has been summoned, in seconds. When invulnerable, the Wither Storm doesn't move and can't be attacked
Range: 1 ~ 320

gui.witherstormmod.config.keepSicknessAf.new: Specifies if Wither Sickness should be removed after a player respawns.
gui.witherstormmod.config.keepSicknessAf.old: Specifies if Wither Sickness should be removed after a player respawns

gui.witherstormmod.config.lowImmuneAppli.new:
Low immunity mobs will be assigned a random application delay modifier that will change the proximity seconds time. This value will set the maximum potential limit for that modifier, in seconds.
Range: 12 ~ 1200
gui.witherstormmod.config.lowImmuneAppli.old:
Low immunity mobs will be assigned a random application delay modifier that will change the proximity seconds time. This value will set the maximum potential limit for that modifier, in seconds
Range: 12 ~ 1200

gui.witherstormmod.config.lowImmuneCureD.new:
Low immunity mobs will be assigned a random cure delay modifier that will change the cure delay time. This value will set the maximum potential limit for that modifier, in seconds.
Range: 12 ~ 1200
gui.witherstormmod.config.lowImmuneCureD.old:
Low immunity mobs will be assigned a random cure delay modifier that will change the cure delay time. This value will set the maximum potential limit for that modifier, in seconds
Range: 12 ~ 1200

gui.witherstormmod.config.lowImmuneProxi.new:
Low immunity mobs will be assigned a random proximity seconds delay modifier that will change the proximity seconds time. This value will set the maximum potential limit for that modifier, in seconds.
Range: 12 ~ 1200
gui.witherstormmod.config.lowImmuneProxi.old:
Low immunity mobs will be assigned a random proximity seconds delay modifier that will change the proximity seconds time. This value will set the maximum potential limit for that modifier, in seconds
Range: 12 ~ 1200

gui.witherstormmod.config.lowResModels.d.new: Uses larger cubes to make up the the phase 4 and up models. May result in a performance increase.
gui.witherstormmod.config.lowResModels.d.old: Uses larger cubes to make up the the phase 4 and up models. May result in a performance increase

gui.witherstormmod.config.lowerBlockResi.new: Lowers the resistance of blocks in the path of the explosion, effectively increasing the strength of the explosion which allows for obsidian, etc. to be destroyed.
gui.witherstormmod.config.lowerBlockResi.old: Lowers the resistance of blocks in the path of the explosion, effectively increasing the strength of the explosion which allows for obsidian, etc. to be destroyed

gui.witherstormmod.config.maxRandomStrol.new:
The max amount of distance a Wither Storm can travel at once when using the RANDOM_STROLL or RANDOM_STROLL_NEAR_PLAYER targeting type.
Range: 200 ~ 5000
gui.witherstormmod.config.maxRandomStrol.old:
The max amount of distance a Wither Storm can travel at once when using the RANDOM_STROLL or RANDOM_STROLL_NEAR_PLAYER targeting type
Range: 200 ~ 5000

gui.witherstormmod.config.maximumDistrac.new:
Distractions will not occur if the Wither Storm's ultimate target is outside the radius determined by this value + its target range. Although, if the ultimate target is inside the radius, but then leaves, a distraction can then later occur.
Range: 100 ~ 3000
gui.witherstormmod.config.maximumDistrac.old:
Distractions will not occur if the Wither Storm's ultimate target is outside the radius determined by this value + its target range. Although, if the ultimate target is inside the radius, but then leaves, a distraction can then later occur
Range: 100 ~ 3000

gui.witherstormmod.config.maximumRoarInt.new:
Specifies the greatest time, in seconds, it will take for one of the Wither Storm's heads to initiate a roar and shoot a flaming skull.
Range: 1 ~ 100
gui.witherstormmod.config.maximumRoarInt.old:
Specifies the greatest time, in seconds, it will take for one of the Wither Storm's heads to initiate a roar and shoot a flaming skull
Range: 1 ~ 100

gui.witherstormmod.config.minimumDistrac.new:
Distractions will not occur IMMEDIATELY if the Wither Storm's ultimate target is INSIDE the radius determined by this value + its target range. If the target is inside this radius, the Wither Storm will wait before becoming distracted, to see if the target is outside the radius. If not, a distraction will not occur. Set to 0 to disable.
Range: 10 ~ 500
gui.witherstormmod.config.minimumDistrac.old:
Distractions will not occur IMMEDIATELY if the Wither Storm's ultimate target is INSIDE the radius determined by this value + its target range. If the target is inside this radius, the Wither Storm will wait before becoming distracted, to see if the target is outside the radius. If not, a distraction will not occur. Set to 0 to disable
Range: 10 ~ 500

gui.witherstormmod.config.minimumRoarInt.new:
Specifies the lowest time, in seconds, it will take for one of the Wither Storm's heads to initiate a roar and shoot a flaming skull.
Range: 1 ~ 100
gui.witherstormmod.config.minimumRoarInt.old:
Specifies the lowest time, in seconds, it will take for one of the Wither Storm's heads to initiate a roar and shoot a flaming skull
Range: 1 ~ 100

gui.witherstormmod.config.minimumSpawnCh.new:
Specifies the minimum interval (+random) in seconds that the Wither Storm should check for Withered Symbiont spawn conditions.
Range: 1 ~ 240
gui.witherstormmod.config.minimumSpawnCh.old:
Specifies the minimum interval (+random) in seconds that the Wither Storm should check for Withered Symbiont spawn conditions
Range: 1 ~ 240

gui.witherstormmod.config.minutesTillRun.new:
Specifies the required time that must pass (in minutes) in order to decrease the runaway attempt amount. This timer only counts if the Wither Storms ultimate target remains in the stationary chunk radius.
Range: 1 ~ 48
gui.witherstormmod.config.minutesTillRun.old:
Specifies the required time that must pass (in minutes) in order to decrease the runaway attempt amount. This timer only counts if the Wither Storms ultimate target remains in the stationary chunk radius
Range: 1 ~ 48

gui.witherstormmod.config.mobsRunIntoPor.new: Specifies if mobs should go into nearby nether portals when running away from a Wither Storm.
gui.witherstormmod.config.mobsRunIntoPor.old: Specifies if mobs should go into nearby nether portals when running away from a Wither Storm. NOTE: Can cause severe server side lag

gui.witherstormmod.config.occludeSoundsU.new: Specifies if sounds from the Wither Storm should be heard when deep underground.
gui.witherstormmod.config.occludeSoundsU.old: Specifies if sounds from the Wither Storm should be heard when deep underground

gui.witherstormmod.config.optifineWarnin.new: Toggles the OptiFine warning upon joining a world.
gui.witherstormmod.config.optifineWarnin.old: Toggles the OptiFine warning upon joining a world

gui.witherstormmod.config.patronCosmetic.new: Toggles the patron cosmetic for nonamecrackers2's Wither Storm backers.
gui.witherstormmod.config.patronCosmetic.old: Toggles the patron cosmetic for nonamecrackers2's Wither Storm backers

gui.witherstormmod.config.playSymbiontTh.new: Toggles the Withered Symbiont theme, created for CWSM by Mar Mar.
gui.witherstormmod.config.playSymbiontTh.old: Toggles the Withered Symbiont theme, created for CWSM by Mar Mar

gui.witherstormmod.config.playWitherStor.new: Toggles the Wither Storm boss theme. NOTE: this theme is from MC:SM and is subject to copyright.
gui.witherstormmod.config.playWitherStor.old: Toggles the Wither Storm boss theme. NOTE: this theme is from MC:SM and is subject to copyright

gui.witherstormmod.config.playerCannotDi.new: Specifies if players should not be able to dismount a tentacle entity. Disable if facing compatibility issues.
gui.witherstormmod.config.playerCannotDi.old: Specifies if players should not be able to dismount a tentacle entity. Disable if facing compatibility issues

gui.witherstormmod.config.playerInvulner.new:
Specifies the time in minutes (+random) that the players who killed a Withered Symbiont should be ignored by the Wither Storm for.
Range: 1 ~ 10
gui.witherstormmod.config.playerInvulner.old:
Specifies the time in minutes (+random) that the players who killed a Withered Symbiont should be ignored by the Wither Storm for
Range: 1 ~ 10

gui.witherstormmod.config.playerSummonin.new:
Specifies the delay in minutes (+random) that the Wither Storm should be able summon a Withered Symbiont for the player it summoned one for.
Range: 1 ~ 60
gui.witherstormmod.config.playerSummonin.old:
Specifies the delay in minutes (+random) that the Wither Storm should be able summon a Withered Symbiont for the player it summoned one for
Range: 1 ~ 60

gui.witherstormmod.config.playerSummonin.new:
If a player kills a Withered Symbiont, their sumoning delay will be increased to this value in minutes (+random).
Range: 1 ~ 60
gui.witherstormmod.config.playerSummonin.old:
If a player kills a Withered Symbiont, their sumoning delay will be increased to this value in minutes (+random)
Range: 1 ~ 60

gui.witherstormmod.config.preventWitherS.new: Specifies if players should temporarily respawn away from the Wither Storm when they die to it, if their respawn point is near the Storm.
gui.witherstormmod.config.preventWitherS.old: Specifies if players should temporarily respawn away from the Wither Storm when they die to it, if their respawn point is near the Storm

gui.witherstormmod.config.proximitySecon.new:
High immunity mobs (players) will be assigned a random proximity seconds modifier that will change the proximity seconds time. This value will set the maximum potential limit for that modifier, in seconds.
Range: 12 ~ 1200
gui.witherstormmod.config.proximitySecon.old:
High immunity mobs (players) will be assigned a random proximity seconds modifier that will change the proximity seconds time. This value will set the maximum potential limit for that modifier, in seconds
Range: 12 ~ 1200

gui.witherstormmod.config.randomBowelsEn.new: Specifies if players should spawn somewhere random when entering the bowels. Disable to revert to a static entrance position.
gui.witherstormmod.config.randomBowelsEn.old: Specifies if players should spawn somewhere random when entering the bowels. Disable to revert to a static entrance position

gui.witherstormmod.config.randomDistract.new: Distractions may or may not occur if the conditions are met/unmet based off of a random chance. Toggle to enable/disable.
gui.witherstormmod.config.randomDistract.old: Distractions may or may not occur if the conditions are met/unmet based off of a random chance. Toggle to enable/disable

gui.witherstormmod.config.randomStrollin.new: Specifies if the Wither Storm should stroll around the player if they're hidden from the storm.
gui.witherstormmod.config.randomStrollin.old: Specifies if the Wither Storm should stroll around the player if they're hidden from the storm

gui.witherstormmod.config.randomizedTarg.new:
If you're using RANDOMIZED targeting you can use this to set how often (in minutes) the Wither Storm should switch its targeting type.
Range: 1 ~ 60
gui.witherstormmod.config.randomizedTarg.old:
If you're using RANDOMIZED targeting you can use this to set how often (in minutes) the Wither Storm should switch its targeting type
Range: 1 ~ 60

gui.witherstormmod.config.renderDebrisCl.new: Toggles the rendering of the debris cloud surrounding the Wither Storm.
gui.witherstormmod.config.renderDebrisCl.old: Toggles the rendering of the debris cloud surrounding the Wither Storm

gui.witherstormmod.config.renderDebrisRi.new: Toggles the rendering of debris rings that surround the Wither Storm (much more performant than the debris cloud).
gui.witherstormmod.config.renderDebrisRi.old: Toggles the rendering of debris rings that surround the Wither Storm (much more performant than the debris cloud)

gui.witherstormmod.config.renderDistantD.new: Setting this value to false will disable the debris cloud when rendering the Wither Storm from large distances.
gui.witherstormmod.config.renderDistantD.old: Setting this value to false will disable the debris cloud when rendering the Wither Storm from large distances

gui.witherstormmod.config.renderPulse.de.new: Specifies if a pulsating effect, mimicking endermen pulling the Wither Storm apart, should be rendered once its evolution is complete.
gui.witherstormmod.config.renderPulse.de.old: Specifies if a pulsating effect, mimicking endermen pulling the Wither Storm apart, should be rendered once its evolution is complete

gui.witherstormmod.config.renderShine.de.new: Specifies if a purple shine should render behind the Wither Storm at night.
gui.witherstormmod.config.renderShine.de.old: Specifies if a purple shine should render behind the Wither Storm at night

gui.witherstormmod.config.renderSkyAmbie.new: Specifies if sky ambience affects (sky darkening) should render when a Wither Storm is nearby.
gui.witherstormmod.config.renderSkyAmbie.old: Specifies if sky ambience affects (sky darkening) should render when a Wither Storm is nearby

gui.witherstormmod.config.renderTractorB.new: Turn off to disable the overlay that appears when inside a tractor beam.
gui.witherstormmod.config.renderTractorB.old: Turn off to disable the overlay that appears when inside a tractor beam

gui.witherstormmod.config.renderTractorB.new: Toggles the rendering of the tractor beams.
gui.witherstormmod.config.renderTractorB.old: Toggles the rendering of the tractor beams

gui.witherstormmod.config.resummonedPhas.new:
Specifies the phase the Wither Storm should be set to when resummoned by a withered beacon.
Range: 0 ~ 7
gui.witherstormmod.config.resummonedPhas.old:
Specifies the phase the Wither Storm should be set to when resummoned by a withered beacon
Range: 0 ~ 7

gui.witherstormmod.config.revivalPlayerP.new:
Specifies the time (in minutes) after being revived that the Wither Storm should ignore players.
Range: 1 ~ 40
gui.witherstormmod.config.revivalPlayerP.old:
Specifies the time (in minutes) after being revived that the Wither Storm should ignore players
Range: 1 ~ 40

gui.witherstormmod.config.revivalTimeMin.new:
Specifies when (in minutes) the Wither Storm will automatically revive when playing dead.
Range: 1 ~ 120
gui.witherstormmod.config.revivalTimeMin.old:
Specifies when (in minutes) the Wither Storm will automatically revive when playing dead
Range: 1 ~ 120

gui.witherstormmod.config.revivalTimer.d.new: Specifies if the Wither Storm should automatically revive if not found after a period of time.
gui.witherstormmod.config.revivalTimer.d.old: Specifies if the Wither Storm should automatically revive if not found after a period of time

gui.witherstormmod.config.rotationSpeed..new:
Specifies the rotation speed of the Wither Storm.
Range: 0.1 ~ 1.0
gui.witherstormmod.config.rotationSpeed..old:
Specifies the rotation speed of the Wither Storm
Range: 0.1 ~ 1.0

gui.witherstormmod.config.searchableRang.new:
Specifies the search radius multiplier for when searching for a random location to go to.
Range: 1 ~ 8
gui.witherstormmod.config.searchableRang.old:
Specifies the search radius multiplier for when searching for a random location to go to
Range: 1 ~ 8

gui.witherstormmod.config.shouldChaseWhe.new: If the ultimate target is stationary for a specific amount of time, the Wither Storm will begin to move towards it at a faster rate (chase). Toggle to enable/disable this feature.
gui.witherstormmod.config.shouldChaseWhe.old: If the ultimate target is stationary for a specific amount of time, the Wither Storm will begin to move towards it at a faster rate (chase). Toggle to enable/disable this feature

gui.witherstormmod.config.shouldChunkLoa.new: Toggle to enable/disable Wither Storm chunk loading when no players are online.
gui.witherstormmod.config.shouldChunkLoa.old: Toggle to enable/disable Wither Storm chunk loading when no players are online

gui.witherstormmod.config.shouldDropFrom.new: Specifies if after a set amount of time the formidibomb item should drop out of whatever inventory is holding it and should spawn as the entity.
gui.witherstormmod.config.shouldDropFrom.old: Specifies if after a set amount of time the formidibomb item should drop out of whatever inventory is holding it and should spawn as the entity

gui.witherstormmod.config.shouldPickUpVe.new: Specifies if the current entity the Wither Storm is picking up has a vehicle, that it should pick it up as well. Ex: Should pick up a player riding a boat.
gui.witherstormmod.config.shouldPickUpVe.old: Specifies if the current entity the Wither Storm is picking up has a vehicle, that it should pick it up as well. Ex: Should pick up a player riding a boat

gui.witherstormmod.config.shouldShowHole.new: Specifies if the bowels entrance hole in the Wither Storm's mass at the end of phase 7 should be available or not.
gui.witherstormmod.config.shouldShowHole.old: Specifies if the bowels entrance hole in the Wither Storm's mass at the end of phase 7 should be available or not

gui.witherstormmod.config.sickenedMobCon.new: Specifies if mobs should convert to sickened mobs once they die from wither sickness.
gui.witherstormmod.config.sickenedMobCon.old: Specifies if mobs should convert to sickened mobs once they die from wither sickness

gui.witherstormmod.config.smartBossbar.d.new: The Wither Storm's bossbar and boss music will automatically toggle based on whether the player is underground or not. Disable to revert back to default bossbar/boss theme logic.
gui.witherstormmod.config.smartBossbar.d.old: The Wither Storm's bossbar and boss music will automatically toggle based on whether the player is underground or not. Disable to revert back to default bossbar/boss theme logic

gui.witherstormmod.config.targetRunawayA.new:
Specifies the required time, in minutes, the Wither Storms ultimate target must be stationary in order to be able to count a runaway attempt when it tries to leave the stationary chunk radius.
Range: 1 ~ 20
gui.witherstormmod.config.targetRunawayA.old:
Specifies the required time, in minutes, the Wither Storms ultimate target must be stationary in order to be able to count a runaway attempt when it tries to leave the stationary chunk radius
Range: 1 ~ 20

gui.witherstormmod.config.targetRunawayA.new: Specifies if the Wither Storm should count the times its ultimate target leaves the stationary chunk radius. After a specified amount of attempts has been reached, the Wither Storm will accelerate to its Target Stationary Speed.
gui.witherstormmod.config.targetRunawayA.old: Specifies if the Wither Storm should count the times its ultimate target leaves the stationary chunk radius. After a specified amount of attempts has been reached, the Wither Storm will accelerate to its Target Stationary Speed

gui.witherstormmod.config.targetRunawayA.new:
Specifies the amount of runaway attempts made by the Wither Storms ultimate target that must be met for it to begin a chase.
Range: 1 ~ 32
gui.witherstormmod.config.targetRunawayA.old:
Specifies the amount of runaway attempts made by the Wither Storms ultimate target that must be met for it to begin a chase
Range: 1 ~ 32

gui.witherstormmod.config.targetRunawayM.new:
Specifies the amount of time in minutes that the Wither Storm's ultimate target has begun to run away in order to slow back down again.
Range: 1 ~ 90
gui.witherstormmod.config.targetRunawayM.old:
Specifies the amount of time in minutes that the Wither Storm's ultimate target has begun to run away in order to slow back down again
Range: 1 ~ 90

gui.witherstormmod.config.targettingDist.new: Specifies when the Wither Storm is done chasing its ultimate target if it should become 'distracted' and go to a random nearby area.
gui.witherstormmod.config.targettingDist.old: Specifies when the Wither Storm is done chasing its ultimate target if it should become 'distracted' and go to a random nearby area

gui.witherstormmod.config.tillShouldShow.new:
If the Wither Storm's ultimate target has a command block tool and the Wither Storm is at phase 7, a timer specified by this value (in minutes) + random will countdown until the hole will automatically appear.
Range: 1 ~ 30
gui.witherstormmod.config.tillShouldShow.old:
If the Wither Storm's ultimate target has a command block tool and the Wither Storm is at phase 7, a timer specified by this value (in minutes) + random will countdown until the hole will automatically appear
Range: 1 ~ 30

gui.witherstormmod.config.tractorBeamPar.new: Specifies if particles inside the tractor beams of the Wither Storm should render.
gui.witherstormmod.config.tractorBeamPar.old: Specifies if particles inside the tractor beams of the Wither Storm should render

gui.witherstormmod.config.tractorPullSpe.new:
Modifies the tractor beam pull speed, higher = faster.
Range: 0.1 ~ 1.0
gui.witherstormmod.config.tractorPullSpe.old:
Modifies the tractor beam pull speed, higher = faster
Range: 0.1 ~ 1.0

gui.witherstormmod.config.ultimateTarget.new: Specifies the targeting type the Wither Storm should use to determine it's ultimate target.
gui.witherstormmod.config.ultimateTarget.old:
Specifies the targeting type the Wither Storm should use to determine it's ultimate target
Allowed Values: NEAREST, FARTHEST, GROUP, NONE, RANDOM_STROLL, RANDOM_STROLL_NEAR_PLAYER

gui.witherstormmod.config.usePhaseAsDist.new: Specifies if the Wither Storm should use the phase as a multiplier when calculating the time in ticks it takes for it to start accelerating, when its ultimate target is stationary.
gui.witherstormmod.config.usePhaseAsDist.old: Specifies if the Wither Storm should use the phase as a multiplier when calculating the time in ticks it takes for it to start accelerating, when its ultimate target is stationary

gui.witherstormmod.config.vertexBufferRe.new: Specifies if CWSM should use more performant rendering when rendering Block Clusters and the Wither Storm's mass. NOTE: It is not recommended to disable this option unless necessary.
gui.witherstormmod.config.vertexBufferRe.old: Specifies if CWSM should use more performant rendering when rendering Block Clusters and the Wither Storm's mass. NOTE: It is not recommended to disable this option unless necessary

gui.witherstormmod.config.witherStormInv.new: Specifies if the Wither Storm should regenerate its health and be melee attackable.
gui.witherstormmod.config.witherStormInv.old: Specifies if the Wither Storm should regenerate its health and be melee attackable

gui.witherstormmod.config.witherStormLOD.new: Specifies if the low res models should be used when being rendered via the distant renderer.
gui.witherstormmod.config.witherStormLOD.old: Specifies if the low res models should be used when being rendered via the distant renderer

gui.witherstormmod.config.witherStormSum.new:
Specifies the delay in minutes (+random) that the Wither Storm will be able to summon a Withered Symbiont.
Range: 1 ~ 20
gui.witherstormmod.config.witherStormSum.old:
Specifies the delay in minutes (+random) that the Wither Storm will be able to summon a Withered Symbiont
Range: 1 ~ 20

removals.argument.witherstormmod.config.inappropr: '%s' is not applicable for the given argument type!
removals.argument.witherstormmod.config.invalidVa: Could not find config value '%s' in %s!
removals.commands.witherstormmod.setConfig.set.fa: Value did not change or is invalid.
removals.commands.witherstormmod.setConfig.set.no: Note: '%s' requires reload of %s to take effect.
removals.config.witherstormmod.preset.custom.desc: Custom values defined by the user. Changing any value defaulted by a preset will change it to custom.
removals.config.witherstormmod.preset.note: NOTE: Changing the preset may override other values, make backups!
removals.gui.witherstormmod.config.alternativeEnt: Uses the sphere fog shape instead of a cylindrical one, to allow the fog on the Wither Storm to be applied correctly. Disable if facing potential incompatibility issues
removals.gui.witherstormmod.config.blockClusterCo: Specifies if block clusters should be able to have special colouring and alpha applied to them. NOTE: DISABLE IF FACING CRASHES WHEN USING SHADERS WITH OPTIFINE
removals.gui.witherstormmod.config.playerFavorabi: This feature makes the Wither Storm more likely to choose nearby players as targets instead of other mobs
removals.gui.witherstormmod.config.playerPickupCh:
The chance for the Wither Storm to choose a player instead of another entity, out of 10
Range: 0 ~ 10
removals.gui.witherstormmod.config.removeNearbyKe: Specifies if kelp items near the Wither Storm should be immediately destroyed. NOTE: Disabling will cause massive server side lag!
Includes various config options for the client with varying purposes, such as performance and personal preference.
Includes config options across all worlds.
removals.gui.witherstormmod.screen.flywheelCompat: Contains options related to the mods compatibility with Flywheel
removals.gui.witherstormmod.screen.formidibombOpt: Contains options related to the Formidibomb
removals.gui.witherstormmod.screen.playingDeadOpt: Contains options related to the Wither Storm's playing dead logic
removals.gui.witherstormmod.screen.server.editing: Changes made will effect not only this new world but also ALL new worlds. Reset the preset to 'default' to revert existing changes. IF YOU'RE PLAYING ON A CUSTOM MODPACK, IT IS BEST TO LEAVE THESE VALUES ALONE.
Includes config options unique for this world. NOTE: All Wither Storms in this world will receive the same config values.
Includes config options unique for each world. Can only be accessed while in a world.
removals.gui.witherstormmod.screen.witherSickness: Contains options related to Wither Sickness
removals.gui.witherstormmod.screen.witheredSymbio: Contains options for the Withered Symbiont
removals.gui.witherstormmod.screen.wsmoptions.inf: If you catch any bugs or issues, please let me know!
